name: WARNING!!
description:
A fun, short, puzzle, math game made with python.

Controls: furthest number is how many turns you have, the number next to that is your number(supposed to match your goal), your goal which is what you need your number to match, the furthest number to the right is what level you are on. When you run out of turns the level resets. Buttons: the green button that says -2 takes away 2 from your number that is supposed to match the goal, the blue button that says 1 adds 1 to your number, the yellow button multiplies your number by 2, the red button is like an enter button.(when your number matches the goal, press the warning button to head on to the next level)

there are 8 levels

it is supposed to crash at the end of the game, good luck!
